title: Pixel 4 64GB reports as 50GB to all apps
content:
I have the 64 GB Pixel 4, which shows a weird discrepancy about its storage capacity.

In Settings, it shows the storage correctly as ... out of 64 GB. Note that the Android system files take up 23 GB.

However, in all other apps, it shows the maximum storage capacity as 50 GB. This makes apps frequently alert me about being low on storage while this is not true.

Does anyone else have this issue? Should I do a factory reset?
